Author: Cider Collective
Description: The official plugin for managing your media through Cider.
Name: CiderDeck

Actions.Name: Song Name

TriggerDescription.Touch: Nothing happens when you press this button.

Actions.Tooltip: Provides a tile to show the currently playing song from Cider.

Actions.Name: Album Art

TriggerDescription.Touch: Nothing happens when you press this button.

Actions.Tooltip: Provides a tile to show the currently playing song's Album Art from Cider.

Actions.Name: Toggle Playback

TriggerDescription.Touch: Pressing this button will toggle playback (Play/Pause) in Cider.

Actions.Tooltip: Provides a tile to toggle the currently playing song in Cider.

Actions.Name: Volume Up

TriggerDescription.Touch: Pressing this button will raise the volume by 10% in Cider.

Actions.Tooltip: Provides a tile to raise the volume in Cider.

Actions.Name: Volume Down

TriggerDescription.Touch: Pressing this button will lower the volume by 10% in Cider.

Actions.Tooltip: Provides a tile to lower the volume in Cider.

Actions.Name: Add To Library

TriggerDescription.Touch: Pressing this button will toggle if the song should be added to the Library in Cider.

Actions.Tooltip: Provides a tile to add/remove the currently playing song from your library in Cider.

Actions.Name: Dislike

TriggerDescription.Touch: Pressing this button will depict if the song should be disliked or not in Cider.

Actions.Tooltip: Provides a tile to dislike the currently playing song in Cider.

Actions.Name: Favorite

TriggerDescription.Touch: Pressing this button will depict if the song should be favorited or not in Cider.

Actions.Tooltip: Provides a tile to like the currently playing song in Cider.

Actions.Name: Skip Song
Actions.Tooltip: Provides a tile to skip the currently playing song in Cider.

Actions.Name: Previous Song

TriggerDescription.Touch: Plays the previous song in Cider.

Actions.Tooltip: Provides a tile to play the previous song in Cider.
